tool_description: Calculates applicable deductibles based on coverage details, claim type, and claim amount to determine net coverage.

claim_amount.description: Total amount of the insurance claim

policy_deductibles.description: List of policy deductibles with amounts

error_messages: Invalid claim amount: Claim amount must be a positive number greater than 0.
Coverage type not recognized: Provide a valid coverage type (collision, comprehensive, liability, property, etc.).
No applicable deductible: Cannot determine applicable deductible from policy information provided.
Deductible format error: Policy deductibles must be in format 'type:amount' or similar structured format.
usage: Provide coverage_type, claim_amount, and policy_deductibles to calculate the applicable deductible amount. Returns deductible details and net coverage amount after deductible.

applicable_deductible.description: Deductible amount that applies to this claim
